Summary: No features just one big light. The two small objects had red and green lights.
divs: Sighting DetailsHad seen the light or object several times before,come in and just hover over a certain spot on the Mountain in front of my Home and one time came in and hovered and slowly lowered itself down until the Trees up there almost hid it from veiw. This one night which was the last time i saw it, my Daughter and her friend were getting ready to go home and me were outside and i had been telling them about it, and there it was actually coming in. It came over almost the same spot but higher up than usual and then all of a sudden 2 lights came out of the bottom of it went away from it and then took 2 separate pathes away from it at a very high speed, no noise, and the two objects both had oselating lights. it reminded me of the movie the third kind by the way those 2 lights traveled one out one way and the other the other way.
